title: Bug 18934: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: Building F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2 and KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only) causes the scrollbars to be enabled in the ImageAnalyzer example. However, the scrollbars are non-functional and do not have any effect. This issue is particularly noticeable when opening a small image, such as an icon, as the scrollbars give the false impression of being able to scroll.
EB: The scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example should be disabled to avoid confusion and provide a consistent user experience.
SR: Disable the scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example to prevent them from being misleading and non-functional.
